availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Green F. Higginson (Union Co, Ky, merchant)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, merchant. Missouri native. Son of Hull Higginson and Libby Higginson. Deputy sheriff in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Uniontown, Kentucky, in 1860. Appointed postmaster at Uniontown on February 14, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 342A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 545.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28 (from 1858 to 1875), p. 188 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
